p: Apoptotic cells in the tumor tissues were detected using TUNEL method by Apoptag ® Plus Peroxidase In Situ Apoptosis Detection Kit (Millipore, MA, USA). TUNEL stained apoptotic cells in the tumor tissue sections were observed under light microscope and 5 random fields of view per section were captured at 100 × magnification. The percentage of apoptotic cells was calculated as the number of apoptotic cells over the total number of cells in each field using the ImageJ software ( Schneider, Rasb & Eliceiri, 2012).
